title: Mysterious Ethereum Whale Accumulates $155 Million Worth of ETH in One Day
description: A mysterious Ethereum ($ETH) whale has been accumulating the second-largest crptocurrency by market capitalization at a rapid pace, adding a staggering 54,721 ETH, valued at $155.7 million, in just 24 hours. The whale’s accumulation, first spotted by on-chain analysis service Spot On Chain, began with the acquisition of 32,002 ETH for $90 million, including a […]
